宅.definition: residence; (coll.) to stay in at home; to hang around at home

宅女.definition: female geek; female nerd; otaku girl

宅男.definition: a guy who stays at home all the time, typically spending a lot of time playing online games (derived from Japanese "otaku")

宅經.definition: The Yellow Emperor's Classic on the Feng Shui of Dwellings

宅配.definition: delivery service, primarily C2C and B2C (Tw)
